name: CSharpGuidelinesAnalyzer
tagline: Reports diagnostics for C# coding guidelines that are not already covered by Resharper.
body: This Visual Studio analyzer supports you in making your code comply with the C# coding guidelines at [CSharpGuidelines](https://github.com/dennisdoomen/CSharpGuidelines). Note that many guidelines are already covered by [Resharper](https://www.jetbrains.com/resharper/), which are not implemented here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
